0871A46B.Toast: Light a ritual brazier to ward evil away from Margrave.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: Priest Matvey has asked me to light an old brazier built by the Knights Penitent to ward off evil.

FAF02F4B.Phase6Description: I should return to Priest Matvey in Margrave and inform him that the knights' old brazier is lit.
